name: nimbly/syndicate
description: Simple queue consumer framework that supports message routing and dispatching.

suggest.pda/pheanstalk: To add support for Beanstalkd queue.
suggest.predis/predis: To add support for Redis based queue and pubsub functionality.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: To add support for AWS Simple Queue Service (SQS) and AWS Simple Notification Service (SNS).
suggest.google/cloud-pubsub: To add support for Google Cloud Pubsub.
suggest.microsoft/azure-storage-queue: To add support for Microsoft Azure Storage Queue.
suggest.iron-io/iron_mq: To add support for Iron Message Queue
